mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectOrdGodAplPrm Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ORD_NO , APL_PRM_TURN , PRM_NO , MBR_CPN_NO , APL_TP_CD , APL_UNIT_CD , PRM_TP_CD , PRM_DTL_TP_CD , APL_AMT , ORD_GOD_TURN , APL_QTY , ORD_GOD_GFT_TURN , ORD_GOD_GFT_NM , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM ORD_GOD_APL_PRM WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND APL_PRM_TURN = #{aplPrmTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
